title: BitcoinPenny
author: BitcoinPenny
content: The widest variety of Bitcoin Penny® collectible coins available since 2015!The Bitcoin Penny Company is proud to present our newest off-the-wall product in the world of crypto-collectible coins! Introducing the NEW Bitcoin Penny® Wonderfully Wacky, Mixed-Up, Who-Knows-What’s-Inside, Surprise, Mystery Rolls — filled with rare and random collectible goodness from 2015 all the way thru our current 2022 Copper Collection!THE STORYWe’ll soon be entering our 9th year of minting Bitcoin Penny® Commemorative Coins. And with each passing year, more and more crypto-enthusiasts are discovering our little copper collectible coins. Unfortunately, many of these new collectors entered onto the scene too late to snag some of our earliest and rarest coins. We’re going to fix that now.Hidden deep in our “archives” (office sofa cushions, vehicle floorboards, inside rattling washing machines, etc) was a vast treasure trove of both old and new, shiny and scuffed, dinged and darkened Bitcoin Penny® Commemorative Coins. We gathered up all those loose coins and hand-rolled them to become our new Bitcoin Penny® Wonderfully Wacky, Mixed-Up, Who-Knows-What’s-Inside, Surprise, Mystery Rolls!Each of these new “Mystery Rolls” contains FORTY (40) Bitcoin Penny® Collectible Coins randomly chosen from the following list. (NOTE: Some of the coins on this list are so rare that we’d totally forgotten they ever existed!)THE FULL LIST OF BP® COINS DISCOVERABLE IN THE MYSTERY ROLLS2015     CJB              Standard / Inaugural2015     CJB              Error (Accidental Book-Turn Orientation)2016     DAVE           Standard2016     DAVE           Error (Accidental Book-Turn Orientation)2016     SN               S. Nakamoto Signature Edition / Error (Accidental Book-Turn Orientation)2017     IRIE             Standard2017     SN               S. Nakamoto Signature Edition2017     IRIE             Mini Physical / DIY Fundable Physical Bitcoin2018     JULIE           Standard2018     SN               S. Nakamoto Signature Edition2018     JULIE           Mini Physical / DIY Fundable Physical Bitcoin2018     DSC             Dallas Super Con Exclusive Giveaway2018     MC               Mantis Cryptos Collaboration / Limited Release2019     AMD             Standard2019     SN               S. Nakamoto Signature Edition2019     AMD             Mini Physical / DIY Fundable Physical Bitcoin2019     ZEPH / RIP    In Loving Memory of Zepher (Beloved BitcoinTalk Forum Member)2020     MGHB           Standard2020     SN                S. Nakamoto Signature Edition2020     MGHB           Mini Physical / DIY Fundable Physical Bitcoin*2021   ZPHR / SN     Double-Headed Sample Proof Coin2021     ZPHR            Standard2021     SN                S. Nakamoto Signature Edition2021     ZPHR            Mini Physical / DIY Fundable Physical Bitcoin2021     DOGE           Special DOGECOIN Edition, Limited Release, Standard (Yellow Brass)2021     DOGE           Special DOGECOIN Edition, Limited Release, Missing Mint Mark (Yellow Brass)2022     NFD              Standard2022     SN                S. Nakamoto Signature Edition2022     NFD              Mini Physical / DIY Fundable Physical Bitcoin*Where did this ultra rare Double-Headed Sample Proof Coin come from? It’s a true mystery! As a fun and exciting tradition, The Bitcoin Penny Company mints four unique Double-Headed Sample Proof Coins along with four matching Double-Tailed Sample Proof Coins at the start of every year. These special DH/DT Sample Proof Coins represent the rarest of our collectible coins. At the start of every annual release, we auction away to the highest bidders and most serious collectors these unique coins as four individual matching proof sets. As far as we knew, all four sets of 2021 DH/DT Sample Proof Coins were long since added to private collections around the world, so why did we find a single 2021 Double-Headed Sample Proof Coin in our lot of random sofa cushion coins? Did the mint send an extra set by accident? Is this a deep state hoax orchestrated by the underground lizard people? And what other crazy, few-of-a-kind coins might be discovered inside our new Mystery Rolls?** As we said above, it’s a true mystery! **We honestly don’t know. After 30 minutes of cataloging and verifying each and every coin variation listed above, we quit due to intense boredom, so only 10% or less of the “Mystery” coins were ever actually evaluated.PRODUCTBitcoin Penny® Wonderfully Wacky, Mixed-Up, Who-Knows-What’s-Inside, Surprise, Mystery Roll — $100.00 USD     Contains FORTY (40) randomly selected Bitcoin Penny® Commemorative Coins minted since 2015.     All coins are guaranteed to be perfectly old or new, shiny or scuffed, dinged or darkened.     Hand-rolled in that classic brown, heavyweight Kraft paper you’ve come to love.     Wrapped in our glossy “bulletproof” sleeve for ultimate protection!     Includes TEN (10) Mini Physicals DIY holographic security stickers.     Total production is limited to approximately 25 rolls.PURCHASING & PAYMENTSPlease make all BTC payments to the following addresses only: 1TBPCoEc2MYiQtjT4xduZjAqCBjPhTNDh or 3MJZ18DfLWBMF5hFjFLQS6DCLgyeLPg3Tx.PayPal and/or other cryptocurrencies such as Litecoin (LTC), Ethereum (ETH), and Roocoin (ROO) may be accepted upon request. PM to inquire.SHIPPINGUSA shipping is an additional charge of $5.00 USD. International (non-USA) shipping is an additional charge of $20.00 USD. (These rates are subject to change.) Please note that we are unable to alter prices on international orders for the purpose of avoiding VAT, duties, and other customs charges. DOODLESYes, you'll receive one free Bitcoin Penny® doodle card with your purchase! For more information, simply PM.Regards,Chris @ The Bitcoin Penny Co.In Code We Trust® / E-Currency Unum®DISCLAIMER: Bitcoin Penny® Commemorative Coins are for entertainment purposes only. No cash value.

comments.body: Please add one mystery roll to my stack and bill sir

comments.author: BitcoinPenny
comments.body: UPDATE: We are now at approximately 50% inventory status for these new Mystery Rolls. (Only about a dozen left in stock.) Grab them while you can!Everyone above this post will have their orders shipped by week's end. (Payments pending, of course.)Thanks again for supporting bitcoin and The Bitcoin Penny Company! Regards,Chris @ TBPCo.

comments.author: BitcoinPenny
comments.body: Good morning, everyone. Sorry for the late update. We've been going crazy preparing for / attending a big coin conference over the last two days and thru this Sunday. Side note: What an interesting experience are these simple numismatic coin conferences! Only a handful of people know anything about bitcoin, and a few of them are vehemently opposed to it. In fact, our very first passerby on the very first day stopped to explain to us how bitcoin is a scam. Here's a brief snippet of that long conversation.ME: Good morning!CLUELESS IDIOT: Are you affiliated with the real bitcoin company?ME: Umm...there is no bitcoin company. CLUELESS IDIOT: Yes, there is.ME: Really?CLUELESS IDIOT: Someone's at the top.ME: Actually, no one is at the top. That's the beauty of bitcoin.CLUELESS IDIOT: Someone is at the top. That's the person with the server. And they can turn off the server and take your bitcoin anytime they want.ME: [Opening my mouth to begin explaining the distributed ledger concept]CLUELESS IDIOT: I don't know if you're aware, but bitcoin...blah blah blah...some fictional man that nobody can find anymore...blah blah blah...he ran off with the bitcoin server...blah blah blah...he has all the bitcoins...blah blah blah...the government...blah blah blah...illegal immigrant Mexicans..blah blah blah...ME: Maybe bitcoin was invented by the Democrats.CLUELESS IDIOT: I think that I detect a little sarcasm in that statement.ME: CLUELESS IDIOT: Hey, I'm ready to be proven wrong. Is there ANYTHING in what I said that you disagree with?ME: Yes.CLUELESS IDIOT: What part?ME: All of it.All in all, the experience is very interesting. These people desperately need schooling on bitcoin, and we're happy to take a few verbal punches in defense of the mighty cryptocurrency. In the meantime, we'll keep you updated on the days' events throughout the weekend. Thanks for supporting bitcoin, everyone! Regards,Chris @ TBPCo.PS—Great question, Cryptogreatdane! We recently wrote a new visual guide to explain that, and we'll be posting the info on Monday after the conference.

comments.author: owlcatz
comments.body: Oh my god, that sounds just like someone I would run into in my neck of the woods, FFS... Hilarious story but so relatable to me, thanks Chris!

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Quote from: BitcoinPenny on October 29, 2022, 10:50:26 AMGood morning, everyone. [awesome story follows]Regards,Chris @ TBPCo.PS—Great question, Cryptogreatdane! We recently wrote a new visual guide to explain that, and we'll be posting the info on Monday after the conference. Haha, what a story, Chris. Thanks for sharing.I have had similar, even though maybe not that extreme cases of crypto talks before.To me, one of the really interesting questions always is: how can you get through this wall of prejeduces - if that’s at all possible?Could you succeed with this person?In any case, would like to get one of these rare random rolls if still available. Will send pm.

comments.author: Cryptogreatdane
comments.body: A big problem i see coming is there is a organized movement on the US conservative side to bash digital currency.  However, there beef is with the soon coming central bank digital dollar. But i hear them frame it as digital currency. We need to get the word out that a centralized digital dollar from the government is different then bitcoin. A matter of fact they are completely different. Btc is the anti-digital dollar.
